page.title: 06Life on the farm
page.content: I am 14 years old and go to school at Moulton Comprehensive.School starts at 8.45am and ends at 3.35pm, when I {walk}the mile and a half to my home at Moulton Lodge Farm. At weekends I get up at about 9am.If I'm not going shopping in Northampton, I watch{television.}In the afternoon,I read or play with my computer.If it is fine, I may go for a walk around the farm. The rest of the weekend is spent watching television or doing school homework. Although living on the farm is quiet and tranquil, I{miss}not being able to see my{friends}as much as I would like. I have a long way to travel for the shops and the bus fare is{expensive. Although of my brothers is training to become a vet and the other is at Agricultural College, I want to become a Doctor when I leave school.
